![](https://images.cubedata.net/img/logo.png)

TCAdmin Module For Blesta Now Released & Christmas Deals on all other owned licenses by CubeData

CubeData is proud to announce our TCAdmin Module for Blesta has been finally released and in the spirit of christmas we have decided to discount it way below where it should be though unlike our last sale with our fraudrecord module we cannot give it out for free this time
and also in the spirit of christmas we also will offer all other owned licenses 50% percent off as well

so please go to our website here: https://cubedata.net pick out your license you want and order the owned license and use this coupon code:

`ACubeDataChristmas2016`

and you will get 50% off the license(which comes down from $100 to $50)

this promotion is valid until the 31st of december 2016 so act fast!


This offer includes the following licenses for our Modules:

     Fraudrecord Billing Module for both billing panels as listed on our site
    
     OpenNebula module for both billing panels as listed on our site
     
     TcAdmin Module for Blesta
     
     CentovaCast Module for Blesta
    
     Spectrocoin Gateway for Blesta
